scripts.slides:build: npm run slides:html && npm run slides:images && npm run slides:assets
scripts.slides:html: npx marp --theme-set slides/themes --html --allow-local-files --bespoke.progress true --bespoke.transition -I slides -o public/slides
scripts.slides:images: npx marp --theme-set slides/themes --image png -I slides -o public/images
scripts.slides:assets: mkdir -p public/slides/images public/slides/themes && cp -r slides/images/* public/slides/images/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r slides/themes/* public/slides/themes/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp slides/whiteboard.js public/slides/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.slides:clean: rm -f public/slides/*.html public/images/*.png public/slides/whiteboard.js 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf public/slides/images public/slides/themes 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.slides:list: ls public/slides/*.html 2>/dev/null || echo 'No hay archivos HTML' && ls public/images/*.png 2>/dev/null || echo 'No hay im√°genes PNG'
scripts.build:all: npm run slides:build && npm run build
